location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sphinx’s battery of 2. 7prs. firing on the range at Basidu’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows a group of men in uniform (most probably crew of the Royal Navy ship HMS Sphinx), most of whom are lying on the ground, next to and behind two guns which appear to have just been fired.Inscriptions:On reverse of image, in pen: ‘Sphinx’s battery of 2. 7prs. firing on the range at Basidu 3/01’.
